tool_description: Google, Bing and Yahoo realtime SERP API
name: SERPhouse
title: SERPhouse

api_list.name: Delayed searches
api_list.description: Scheduled SERP task and get result within a few minutes on provided postback/pingback url
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://serphouse.p.rapidapi.com/serp/schedule"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "serphouse.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Real time searches
api_list.description: Execute request real time and get data within a few minute
api_list.code:
